public class HexVectorImage
extends VectorImage

HexVectorImage draw a hexagon as a vector image. $Id: HexVectorImage.java,v 1.2 2006/01/05 19:50:37 tjoneslo Exp $

Constructor Detail

HexVectorImage

public HexVectorImage()
Creates a regular hexagon of standard size. Use an affinity transform to change the size of the shape.

HexVectorImage

public HexVectorImage(boolean north,
                      boolean northEast,
                      boolean southEast,

Creates a partial regular hexagon of standard size. Use an affinity tranform to change the size of the hexagon

HexVectorImage

public HexVectorImage(int side)
Create one side of a regular hexagon of standard size. Use an affinity tranforamation to change the size of the hexagon side.

Parameters:
side - Which side to draw, follows the clock: 1: North East, 2: South East, 3: South, 4: South West, 5: North West, 6: North.
